name: DEADSHOT: THE POET (Jam Ver 1.0)
description:
WARNING

This is an interactive poem about my experience as a trans person. Made for the TRANS FUCKING RAGE JAM on Itch.io. There are references to suicide, self harm, dysphoria, and transphobia.

Please proceed with caution!

This is the poetic narrative concept for a Psychological Horror Game of the same name, and is in some way a prologue. If you'd like to help me develop this game and be able to live life in general, please donate on this poem's itch page or hit my ko-fi. Hope you enjoy this barf of words.

Want to check out my other work? Here's all my socials so you can check out my artwork. I do character design and illustration, everything from nerdy fanart of colorful hedgehogs to fully rendered gay greatness.
